data.name: B
data.value: Blepharitis

data.name: B0
data.value: Tier 0. Pale lid margin. Openings of meibomian glands visible. Clean lashes.

data.name: B1
data.value: Tier 1. Pink lid margin. Openings of meibomian glands less visible. Clean lashes.

data.name: B2
data.value: Tier 2. Red lid margin. Openings of meibomian glands barely visible. Yellow crust at base of lashes. Some lashes stuck together.

data.name: B3
data.value: Tier 3. Telangiectasis lid margin. Increased crusting. More lashes stuck together. Bulbar conjunctival redness.

data.name: B4
data.value: Tier 4. Severe telangiectasis of lid margin. Excess yellow crusting. Lashes stuck together. Increased bulbar conjunctival redness. Skin irritation.

data.name: Cd
data.value: Corneal distortion

data.name: Cd0
data.value: Tier 0. Bright, sharp, circular keratometer mire.

data.name: Cd1
data.value: Tier 1. Slightly distorted keratometer mire. Variation in thickness of circle.

data.name: Cd2
data.value: Tier 2. Distorted keratometer mire. Variation in thickness of circle. Loss of focus of right and top +/- signs.

data.name: Cd3
data.value: Tier 3. Very distorted keratometer mire. Greater variation in thickness of circle. Loss of focus of right of all +/- signs.

data.name: Cd4
data.value: Tier 4. Extremely distorted keratometer mire. Greater variation in thickness of circle with some gaps. Loss of focus of right of all +/- signs.

data.name: Ci
data.value: Corneal infiltrates

data.name: Ci0
data.value: Tier 0. Clear cornea. Clear conjunctiva and limbus. Clear reflex.

data.name: Ci1
data.value: Tier 1. Single small grey infiltrate at 10 o'clock near limbus. Adjacent limbal redness.

data.name: Ci2
data.value: Tier 2. Five small grey infiltrates at 9-10 o'clock near limbus. Adjacent limbus more red.

data.name: Ci3
data.value: Tier 3. Numerous small hazy grey infiltrates at 8-10 o'clock in peripheral cornea. Adjacent limbus very red.

data.name: Ci4
data.value: Tier 4. Hazy grey confluent infiltrates that cover left half of cornea. Adjacent limbal redness from 5 to 11 o'clock. Mild conjunctival redness.

data.name: Cn
data.value: Corneal neovascularization

data.name: Cn0
data.value: Tier 0. Clear cornea. White reflex.

data.name: Cn1
data.value: Tier 1. Vessels encroach <1mm from lower left quadrant (LLQ).

data.name: Cn2
data.value: Tier 2. Vessels encroach 2-3mm from LLQ. Limbal redness. Reflex less crisp. Central corneal haze.

data.name: Cn3
data.value: Tier 3. Vessels encroach 4-5mm from LLQ. Corneal haze around vessels. Speckled reflex.

data.name: Cn4
data.value: Tier 4. Vessels encroach 6mm from LLQ. Lipid at leading edge of vessels. Very diffuze reflex.

data.name: Co
data.value: Corneal oedema

data.name: Co0
data.value: Tier 0. Clear cornea and 3mm wide parallelepiped. Left: endothelium. Centre: stroma. Right: epithelium.

data.name: Co1
data.value: Tier 1. Single vertical stria in posterior cornea.

data.name: Co2
data.value: Tier 2. Three vertical striae in posterior cornea.

data.name: Co3
data.value: Tier 3. Many vertical striae in posterior cornea. Folds in endothelium.

data.name: Co4
data.value: Tier 4. Many vertical striae in posterior cornea. Many folds in endothelium. Epithelial bullae.

data.name: Cr
data.value: Conjunctival redness

data.name: Cr0
data.value: Tier 0. 'White' bulbar conjunctiva. One major vessel. Clear cornea.

data.name: Cr1
data.value: Tier 1. Small increase in conjunctival redness. Major vessel more engorged.

data.name: Cr2
data.value: Tier 2. Further increase in conjunctival redness. Limbal redness. Slight ciliary flush.

data.name: Cr3
data.value: Tier 3. Conjunctiva very red. Increased limbal redness. Ciliary flush.

data.name: Cr4
data.value: Tier 4. Conjunctiva extremely red. Limbus very red. Intense ciliary flush. Reflex on major vessel.

data.name: Cs
data.value: Corneal staining

data.name: Cs0
data.value: Tier 0. Clear cornea. No staining. Fluorescein in eye. Cobalt blue reflex.

data.name: Cs1
data.value: Tier 1. Light punctate staining. Slight conjunctival redness.

data.name: Cs2
data.value: Tier 2. More punctate staining. Increases redness.

data.name: Cs3
data.value: Tier 3. Light pan-corneal punctate staining. Diffuse reflex.

data.name: Cs4
data.value: Tier 4. Heavy pan-corneal punctate staining. Very diffuse reflex.

data.name: Cst
data.value: Conjunctival staining

data.name: Cst0
data.value: Tier 0. Clear cornea. Fluorescein pooling in some folds. Cobalt blue reflex.

data.name: Cst1
data.value: Tier 1. Increased fluorescein pooling in folds. Slight staining at position of lens edge.

data.name: Cst2
data.value: Tier 2. More fluorescein pooling in folds. Increased lens edge staining. Increased conjunctival redness.

data.name: Cst3
data.value: Tier 3. Widespread fluorescein pooling in folds. Continuous lens edge staining. Conjunctival redness.

data.name: Cst4
data.value: Tier 4. Widespread fluorescein pooling in folds. Heavy lens edge staining. Conjunctival redness. Limbal staining.

data.name: Cu
data.value: Corneal ulcer

data.name: Cu0
data.value: Tier 0. Clear cornea. Clear conjunctiva and limbus. Clear reflex.

data.name: Cu1
data.value: Tier 1. <1mm corneal ulcer at left pupil margin. Stains with fluorescein. Mild limbal redness at 7-11 o'clock.

data.name: Cu2
data.value: Tier 2. 2-3mm corneal ulcer. Haze around ulcer. Intense limbal redness at 7-11 o'clock. Ciliary flush.

data.name: Cu3
data.value: Tier 3. 6mm corneal ulcer. Haze around ulcer. General corneal haze. Intense circumlimbal redness. Conjunctival redness. Increased ciliary flush.

data.name: Cu4
data.value: Tier 4. White pan-corneal ulcer. Cornea opaque. Intense circumlimbal and conjunctival redness. Intense ciliary flush.

data.name: Eb
data.value: Endothelial blebs

data.name: Eb0
data.value: Tier 0. Cells same size. Hexagonal shape. No blebs.

data.name: Eb1
data.value: Tier 1. One bleb.

data.name: Eb2
data.value: Tier 2. Three single blebs. Two double-cell blebs.

data.name: Eb3
data.value: Tier 3. Large number of blebs. 'Thickened' cell borders.

data.name: Eb4
data.value: Tier 4. Very large number of blebs. Increased spacing between cells.

data.name: Em
data.value: Epithelial microcysts

data.name: Em0
data.value: Tier 0. High magnification view of pupil margin. Clear cornea.

data.name: Em1
data.value: Tier 1. Single microcysts at pupillary margin. Mycrocyst dysplays reversed illumination.

data.name: Em2
data.value: Tier 2. 16 microcysts. Some appear faint (newly formed).

data.name: Em3
data.value: Tier 3. About 70 microcysts. Some microcysts at the surface stain with fluorescein.

data.name: Em4
data.value: Tier 4. About 180 microcysts. Many microcysts at the surface stain with fluorescein.

data.name: Ep
data.value: Endothelial polymegathism

data.name: Ep0
data.value: Tier 0. Cells same size. Hexagonal shape. Coefficient of variation (COV) = 0.15.

data.name: Ep1
data.value: Tier 1. Small variance in cell size. COV = 0.25.

data.name: Ep2
data.value: Tier 2. Increased variance in cell size. COV = 0.35. Some five-, six- and seven-sided cells.

data.name: Ep3
data.value: Tier 3. Considerable variance in cell size. COV = 0.45. Some three-, four-, five-, six- and seven-sided cells.

data.name: Ep4
data.value: Tier 4. Substantial variance in cell size. COV = 0.55. Some three-, four-, five-, six-, seven-, eight- and nine-sided cells.

data.name: Eye
data.value: ..\images\Eye.png;System.Drawing.Bitmap, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a

data.name: Lr
data.value: Limbal redness

data.name: Lr0
data.value: Tier 0. 'White' limbus. White corneal reflex.

data.name: Lr1
data.value: Tier 1. Slightly increased limbal redness. White corneal reflex.

data.name: Lr2
data.value: Tier 2. Increased limbal redness. Increased conjunctival redness. White corneal reflex.

data.name: Lr3
data.value: Tier 3. Limbus very red. Increased conjunctival redness. Speckled corneal reflex.

data.name: Lr4
data.value: Tier 4. Limbus extremely red. Conjunctival redness. Hazy corneal reflex.

data.name: Mgd
data.value: Meibomian gland dysfunction

data.name: Mgd0
data.value: Tier 0. Pale lid margin. Openings of meibomian glands visible. Clean lashes.

data.name: Mgd1
data.value: Tier 1. Pink lid margin. Cloudy expression at some gland orifices.

data.name: Mgd2
data.value: Tier 2. Red lid margin. Milky expression at most gland orifices. Increased tearing.

data.name: Mgd3
data.value: Tier 3. Red lid margin. Yellow expression at most gland orifices. Expressions becoming continuous.

data.name: Mgd4
data.value: Tier 4. Thick creamy expression at all gland orifices. Expressions continuous. Bulbar conjunctival redness.

data.name: Pc
data.value: Papillary conjunctivitis

data.name: Pc0
data.value: Tier 0. Pale conjunctiva. Vessels clearly visible. Slight roughness at tarsal fold.

data.name: Pc1
data.value: Tier 1. Pink conjunctiva. Vessels visible. Increased roughness at tarsal fold.

data.name: Pc2
data.value: Tier 2. Red conjunctiva. Vessels less visible. Papillae at tarsal fold. Reflexes on some papillae.

data.name: Pc3
data.value: Tier 3. Very red conjunctiva. Vessels barely visible. Large papillae. Bright papillary reflexes. Single mucus strand.

data.name: Pc4
data.value: Tier 4. Extremely red conjunctiva. Vessels not visible. Very large papillae. Bright papillary reflexes. More mucus strands.

data.name: Slk
data.value: Superior limbic keratoconjunctivitis

data.name: Slk0
data.value: Tier 0. Clear conjunctiva. Clear superior limbus. Clear cornea. Clear reflex.

data.name: Slk1
data.value: Tier 1. Increased conjunctival redness. Slight limbal redness. Clear cornea.

data.name: Slk2
data.value: Tier 2. Conjunctival redness and staining. Increased limbal redness. Corneal staining and infiltrates.

data.name: Slk3
data.value: Tier 3. Greater conjunctival redness and staining. Increased limbal redness. 2-3mm fibrovascular pannus. Greater corneal staining and infiltrates.

data.name: Slk4
data.value: Tier 4. Severe conjunctival redness and staining. Severe limbal redness. 5mm fibrovascular pannus. Severe corneal staining and infiltrates.
